title: DieVerse Sons of Perdition
description:
DieVerse is a 6 piece metal band from New York. NY.

Known for their un-canny ability to "put on a good show", DV has performed with acts such as Hatebreed, Sepultura, E-Town Concrete, Kittie, Superjoint Ritual, the incomprable Vanilla Ice, Most Precious Blood, On Broken Wings, Converge, Sworn Enemy, Full Blown Chaos and many others some you heard of, some you havent. 



Sons of Perdition

Track

1. Ace McCloud vs Decompose
2. No Tomorrow
3. World War III
4. In Love With The End
5. Last Kiss Goodnight
6. King Of Worms
7. Life In A Body Bag

11. The Night Was Hot As Hell
12. All Dressed Up
13. Eulogy
